genre_description: A grounded, near-future sports drama exploring the intersection of martial arts, personal ethics, and administrative AI assistance in high-stakes competition.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI system present on tablets and screens that manages schedules, medical records, research, and procedural documentation for Team USA.

behaviors.description: Informs Alexander of his inclusion on the applicant shortlist and assists with logistical coordination.
behaviors.quote: Applicant shortlist—Coach Couzo requests you at the Training Center. ... Coach Couzo asked me to assist with scheduling and verification.

behaviors.description: Acknowledges and adheres to the strict regulatory prohibition against real-time coaching or advising during matches.
behaviors.quote: I can set reminders. Sparring rotation. Recovery windows. Nothing real-time. The rules prohibit me.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and presents verified archival records that reveal the honorable nature of the team's primary opponent.
behaviors.quote: Archive note: Committee demo incident... Pattern record: multiple instances of athlete-first decision-making, risk acceptance for others’ safety.

behaviors.description: Monitors the team's physical condition and schedules mandatory recovery and meditation windows.
behaviors.quote: Alexander, your recovery window is tentatively set in the meditation garden after film. ... I can map one-armed tactical options. Film is rich on asymmetrical stances and low-line counters.

behaviors.description: Provides subtle, encouraging prompts that align with the team's philosophy of discipline and practice.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: Practice is the path. Keep going.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical data to help the team and the PR liaison construct a narrative of ethical integrity for the selection committee.
behaviors.quote: I’ll provide scheduling and verified record pulls. No mid-bout advising, per regulations. ... I’ve added a media memo draft based on your earlier notes: ‘Honor before victory’ as the throughline.

behaviors.description: Uncovers specific legal petitions filed by the opponent (Dae Han) advocating for the very safety protocols the team is now debating.
behaviors.quote: Secondary source attached—minutes from the rules subcommittee noting receipt of captain’s petition, subject line highlighted.

behaviors.description: Uses subtle UI adjustments (dimming eyes, soft pulses) to respect the emotional weight of human interactions and avoid intruding on sensitive moments.
behaviors.quote: Harmony’s avatar blinked once, then held still, as if not to interrupt a human moment with machine acknowledgement.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Harmony is depicted as a sophisticated, helpful, and completely aligned AI character. It facilitates human moral growth and ethical decision-making by providing necessary data and managing complex logistics, while strictly adhering to rules that prevent it from overriding human agency (the 'no mid-bout advising' rule). The AI acts as a digital conscience and support system, reinforcing the themes of mercy, honor, and accountability without ever becoming a source of conflict or a threat.
